Posted By: Bobth (1/19/2013 11:50:39 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
You know what? This is a well-built card, flavourfully.  
  
As the flavour text says, this zombie is a product of weaker vampires. They turned some poor sap into this brainless thing: unable to think for itself, unable to understand basic motor functions. The weaker vampires don't have the skill to make it any better, so that's why it can't block.  
  
I mean, it's worthless inside limited, but at least it makes sense why it is worthless.
posts.html:

I mean, it's worthless inside limited, but at least it makes sense why it is worthless.

posts.post_content:
how about, Swampwalk if you control a vampire.   
  
**This does serve a purpose tho, wasting a card slot because they dont want you to get a winner in every pack.**  
  
Zedikar was a powerful block. *Every* set has its mindless null, including Urza's and Mirrodin. The weak cards dont define the strong cards, the strong cards define themselves and warp formats! So stop pretending like printing weak cards slows down powercreep, because mindless null didnt slow a dang thing down! Okay wizards?
